subject: Pédaliers
description_text:
J’aimerai acheter un pédalier.. j’ai un wheelstand gt oméga ddx.. est ce que vos pédales sont compatibles avec? Quel est la différence entre le pro x, pro x plus ou pro x plus ultra ? Merci 
Envoyé de mon iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Sylvain .,  At the moment, we only have two latest versions available: PlusX and ProX Ultra (with lighting). If you do not need the lighting feature, I would recommend the PlusX. The product detail page includes the dimensions of both the pedals and the base plate, so you can compare them with your rig or mounting bracket to ensure compatibility.
